item.title: Community Connecting ABCD
item.description:
Who is it for? 
The Community Connecting ABCD is for all health and social care workers and their employers.
What does it do? 

The Community Connecting ABCD provides simple principles and advice for practitioners who are looking to develop skills as  community connectors and their employers. . It supports good conversations and creative planning with people to achieve the outcome of building a person’s connections and relationships within their local community.

How can you use it? 
The Community Connecting ABCD could be given to practitioners and employers who are looking to develop strengths based approaches to self-directed support conversations and planning. It could also be used in team training and inductions.
